column2: "It's really Azanami's fault, but, I'm sorry you got wrapped up in our mess."
"...Some apology. I saw that look on your face when you grabbed me, you pervert."
"Were we not past this? You said you were over it!!"
"...We spoke at great length, solving our mutual misunderstandings."
"...and also agreed that we must get to know one other better."
"E-exactly! I'll show Marlu what it means to be Hunter, while she teaches me the ways of the Force!"
"By such mutual interchange, we will strengthen the ARKS organization!! Right? Right!?"
"That is our single objective!! So don't start any strange rumors!!"

"... Could you be any more blunt?
Hmph, I'm done here."
"M-Marlu! Don't take the lead by yourself! It's dangerous!! ...Gotta run!!"
